articles.title: Women are more burnt out than men – here's why, and what to do if you're chronically overwhelmed - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In an episode of the Womankind podcast, CNA Women's Hidayah Salamat asks a former corporate lawyer and co-founder of an online mental health platform why women appear disproportionately more affected by burnout – and the simplest way to stop it in its tracks.

articles.title: The sisters behind GenK Jewelry are on a mission to make jade modern, feminine and fashionable again - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: GenK Jewelry's Genevie and Kayde Yeo are winning over young women with their contemporary jewellery designs that have successfully shaken off the traditional image people tend to have of the precious stone.

articles.title: Royston Tan's 24 awarded Jury Special Mention at Jogja-Netpac Asian Film Festival - Channel NewsAsia
